title: Xerath or Lissandra
body: I'm thinking whether to pick between Xerath or Lissandra! They both amuse me and I don't know which to pick

replies.body: to be fair faelaren is right, however i personally prefer xerath and his range, if you're a good xerath you never actually have to engage fully in a fight for the entire game, granted you will be focused because you're such a nuisance, but you have a massive slow that deals damage and a stun, on top of a q that has a horrific cooldown, if you built a ROA an hourglass and rylais, you'd be tanky enough to survive any onslaught mid to late game, zhonyas and wait for your cooldowns, stun and run.
lissandra, take her top and stomp everyone.

At the end of the day it comes down to what you prefer to play.
Personally out of the 2 I find Xerath more fun but like I said that's what I like :)
